bibl.title: "Bainchoooch" = 3663 - No Palindrome.
bibl.note: Replies to: Christopher A. Faraone and Roy Kotansky, An Inscribed Gold Phylactery in Stamford, Connecticut, ZPE 75 (1988) pp. 257-266, 1 fac-sim. et pl. IXa. - 3663 and 2662 may present numerical palindromes in the modern system of numeration; expressed in the Greek system, however, neither "Gchxg" nor "Bchxb" are palindromes.
bibl.seg: Replies to: Christopher A. Faraone and Roy Kotansky, An Inscribed Gold Phylactery in Stamford, Connecticut, ZPE 75 (1988) pp. 257-266, 1 fac-sim. et pl. IXa. - 3663 and 2662 may present numerical palindromes in the modern system of numeration; expressed in the Greek system, however, neither "Gchxg" nor "Bchxb" are palindromes.
